actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to require that at least one member of the Federal Communications Commission be an electrical engineer.

summary.text: Requires under the Communications Act, that at least one member of the Federal Communications Commission be an electrical engineer. (Amends 47 U.S.C. 154(a))

titles.title: A bill to amend the Communications Act of 1934 to require that at least one member of the Federal Communications Commission be an electrical engineer.
